{{Wired embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=SURFboard |revision=SB6120 |upc=612572179864 |ean= |asin=B001UI2FPE |price= |est_release_date=09/2009 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETC4830;P5M, TNETC4830ZDW, 95A0RLW; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=FL064AIF |fla1_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H16M16BG-37E:B |ram1_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=LSI |eth_chip2_model=ET1011C2-C;ET1011C2-C, 0946T (e3), NNM48832; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Cable Tuner;Microtune;MT2170;MT2170F, OJJ410003G, 2809-A0;1; ,,, Programmable Gain Amplifier (optimized for DOCSIS 3.0);Anadigics;ARA2017;ARA2017R, 21315AQ, 0935TH;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:22:10 }} '''Motorola SB6120 SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem'''
Per [http://slickdeals.net/f/3237411-Motorola-SURFboard-SB6121-DOCSIS-3-0-Cable-Modem-71?page=7 this Slickdeals thread] and [http://www.modempremodz.net/us.html MmodemPremodz], this device uses a TI chipset.<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=4 |up_c=4 }}
===Noted P/Ns=== *'''Motorola''' P/N: 545100-009-00, 00:22:10 MAC :The '''Motorola''' logo, "P/N: 541663-004 REV: 1", "MADE IN TAIWAN", and PCB manuf. text ("120N6423-02R 5-2", "TCI-S1S H /_\ 94V-0", and a date code of '''0935''') are silkscreened on one board bearing this P/N :"P/N: 541662-011-00" is (among other things) printed on the label affixed to the tuner shield. *All caps on the board are '''Nichicon''' branded :Specs in the infobox are per this unit
===External links=== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/-352 On '''SpeedGuide.net''']
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=67 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} ([http://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/buy-or-lease-your-modem/arris-sb6120-userguide.pdf Manual] | [http://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/twc-compatible-modems.pdf List of Time Warner approved modems])
